name: pm5.4

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wi(w0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w0, w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(w0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wi(w0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w0, w1)))

|- wb(wi(w0, wi(w0, w1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w0, wi(w0, w1)))

comment: Antecedent absorption implication. Theorem *5.4 of [WhiteheadRussell] p. 125. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
